title: GET_MAKE_NAME_FROM_VEHICLE_MODEL
content:
0xF7AF4F159FF99F97// GetMakeNameFromVehicleModel
char* GET_MAKE_NAME_FROM_VEHICLE_MODEL(Hash modelHash);Parameters:modelHash: The model hash of the vehicle.Returns: Returns the display label of the manufacturer if the vehicle model is recognized, or "CARNOTFOUND" if the hash does not correspond to any known vehicle model.Retrieves the manufacturer's name for a specified vehicle.NativeDB Introduced: v1868Old name:  _GET_MAKE_NAME_FROM_VEHICLE_MODELExamples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- This example prints the manufacturer of the player's current vehicle.

-- Retrieve the player ped.
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in.
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- If the vehicle does not exist, end the execution of the code here.
if not DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then 
    return 
end

-- Retrieve the model hash of the vehicle.
local vehicleHash = GetEntityModel(vehicle)

-- Retrieve the manufacturer of the vehicle.
local manufacturer = GetMakeNameFromVehicleModel(vehicleHash)

-- Print the manufacturer of the vehicle.
print("Vehicle Manufacturer: " .. manufacturer)
codeBlocks:
-- This example prints the manufacturer of the player's current vehicle.

-- Retrieve the player ped.
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()

-- Retrieve the vehicle the player is currently in.
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(playerPed, false)

-- If the vehicle does not exist, end the execution of the code here.
if not DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then 
    return 
end

-- Retrieve the model hash of the vehicle.
local vehicleHash = GetEntityModel(vehicle)

-- Retrieve the manufacturer of the vehicle.
local manufacturer = GetMakeNameFromVehicleModel(vehicleHash)

-- Print the manufacturer of the vehicle.
